name: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 9
description:
Fairytale heroes in a fairytale world! Amazing locations and interesting levels solitaire based on the Grimm brothers fairy tales.

200 game levels in the solitaire genre of tripeaks. Collect cards in sequence to get to the gold cards..

- Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards!
- Exciting levels that won't let you get bored!
- Pick cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the combo multiplier,
That gives you more coins!
- Original themed decks and 9 card shirt styles!
